name: part_005
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and Tokoyami Towa perform a duet cover of the song 'Mephisto' on a dark, gothic-themed stage.
A transition to a bright, colorful stage where IRyS and Usada Pekora perform a cover of 'Bokusatsu Tenshi Dokuro-chan'.

subtitles.original: ラストチャンスに飢えたつま先が
subtitles.english: My toes, starved for one last chance...

subtitles.original: 踊り出すまま駆けたこの夜空
subtitles.english: ...dashed through the night sky as they danced.

subtitles.original: 並のスタンスじゃ靡かない
subtitles.english: With an ordinary stance, I won't sway.

subtitles.original: 星は宝石の憧れ
subtitles.english: The stars are the envy of jewels.

subtitles.original: 浮かぶ涙と汗は血の名残り
subtitles.english: The floating tears and sweat are the remains of blood.

subtitles.original: 目の中でしか泳げない芝居
subtitles.english: A play that can only swim within the eyes.

subtitles.original: だけどステージが逃がさない
subtitles.english: But the stage won't let go.

subtitles.original: いついつまでも憧れ
subtitles.english: Always and forever, a longing.

subtitles.original: 焦がれているよ
subtitles.english: I'm yearning for it.

subtitles.original: I've never seen such a liar.
subtitles.english: I've never seen such a liar.

subtitles.original: 生まれつきだっての底なし
subtitles.english: Born with a bottomless nature.

subtitles.original: This lie is love. And this lie is a gift to the world.
subtitles.english: This lie is love. And this lie is a gift to the world.

subtitles.original: 誰と生きたか思い出して
subtitles.english: Remember who you lived with.

subtitles.original: わたしが命を掛けるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll put my life on the line...

subtitles.original: あげるから
subtitles.english: ...I'll give it to you.

subtitles.original: あなたは時間をくれたのでしょう？
subtitles.english: You gave me your time, didn't you?

subtitles.original: あらゆる望みのすべてを叶えたら
subtitles.english: If all of every desire is fulfilled...

subtitles.original: あぁ果たせたら
subtitles.english: Ah, if they could be realized...

subtitles.original: あなたに会いたい
subtitles.english: I want to see you.

subtitles.original: 星に願いをかけて
subtitles.english: Making a wish upon a star.

subtitles.original: 戻れないから大切にするの
subtitles.english: I'll treasure it because there's no going back.

subtitles.original: 始めないなら高を括れるよ
subtitles.english: If I don't start, I can underestimate it.

subtitles.original: 楽になる日は末代
subtitles.english: The day it gets easier is generations away.

subtitles.original: 日々の中に集まる
subtitles.english: Gathering within the days...

subtitles.original: 悲しい光
subtitles.english: ...is a sorrowful light.

subtitles.original: 生まれつきだせば底なし
subtitles.english: If born into it, it's bottomless.

subtitles.original: This lie is love. And this lie is a gift to the world.
subtitles.english: This lie is love. And this lie is a gift to the world.

subtitles.original: 誰を活きたか忘れちゃった！
subtitles.english: I've forgotten who I lived as!

subtitles.original: あなたに命が戻るなら 届くなら
subtitles.english: If life returns to you, if it reaches you...

subtitles.original: わたしはどうなろうと構わないのに
subtitles.english: ...I wouldn't care what happens to me.

subtitles.original: どうやら総ては叶わない
subtitles.english: Apparently, not everything will come true.

subtitles.original: 叶わないならば
subtitles.english: If it won't come true...

subtitles.original: あなたになりたい
subtitles.english: ...then I want to become you.

subtitles.original: 星は耽け耽る
subtitles.english: The stars grow deeper and deeper.

subtitles.original: わたしが命を
subtitles.english: I will...

subtitles.original: 掛けるから あげるから
subtitles.english: ...put my life on the line, I'll give it to you.

subtitles.original: あなたは時間をくれたのでしょう？
subtitles.english: You gave me your time, didn't you?

subtitles.original: あらゆる望みのすべてを叶えたら
subtitles.english: If all of every desire is fulfilled...

subtitles.original: あぁ果たせたら
subtitles.english: Ah, if they could be realized...

subtitles.original: あなたに会いたい
subtitles.english: I want to see you.

subtitles.original: 星に願いをかけて
subtitles.english: Making a wish upon a star.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よくお眠りなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, sleep well.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よくお眠りなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, sleep well.

subtitles.original: 輝きは鈍らない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: The brilliance won't dull, if it's you all.

subtitles.original: 輝きは鈍らない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: The brilliance won't dull, if it's you all.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よく狙いなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, aim well.

subtitles.original: さあ星の子たちよ よく狙いなさい
subtitles.english: Now, children of the stars, aim well.

subtitles.original: またたきを許さない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: I won't allow a flicker, if it's you all.

subtitles.original: またたきを許さない あなたたちならば
subtitles.english: I won't allow a flicker, if it's you all.

subtitles.original: 撲殺天使ドクロちゃん
subtitles.english: Bludgeoning Angel Dokuro-chan

subtitles.original: ぴぴるぴるぴるぴぴるぴ〜
subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: ぴぴるぴるぴるぴぴるぴ〜
subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: 何でもできちゃうバット エスカリボルグ〜
subtitles.english: The bat that can do anything, Excaliborg~

subtitles.original: 何でもできちゃうバット エスカリボルグ
subtitles.english: The bat that can do anything, Excaliborg

subtitles.original: ぴぴるぴるぴるぴぴるぴ〜
subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: ぴぴるぴるぴるぴぴるぴ〜
subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: 魔法の擬音で人生やり直してあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you start your life over with magical onomatopoeia.

subtitles.original: いやん よだめよ こんなの バカバカ
subtitles.english: Oh no, you mustn't, this is... Stupid, stupid!

subtitles.original: そんなにギラギラしないで
subtitles.english: Don't be so glaring.

subtitles.original: お願い 痛くしちゃ えい！
subtitles.english: Please, don't make it hurt... Hyah!

subtitles.original: 撲殺天使 血飛沫ドクドク ドクロちゃん
subtitles.english: Bludgeoning Angel, blood-splattering doku doku Dokuro-chan.

subtitles.original: 撲殺天使 心臓ドクドク ドクロちゃん
subtitles.english: Bludgeoning Angel, heart-pounding doku doku Dokuro-chan.

subtitles.original: 踏んで 縛って 叩いて
subtitles.english: Step on me, tie me up, hit me.

subtitles.original: 蹴って 濡らして 潰して
subtitles.english: Kick me, soak me, crush me.

subtitles.original: でも それって ボクの「愛」なの
subtitles.english: But that's just my "love".

subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: ぴぴるぴるぴるぴぴるぴ〜
subtitles.english: Pipiru piru piru pipiru pi~

subtitles.original: 不思議な擬音で夢 叶えてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll grant your dream with mysterious onomatopoeia.

subtitles.original: いやん バカァ〜ん ダメダメ
subtitles.english: Oh no, silly~ You mustn't.

subtitles.original: そんなにムラムラしないで
subtitles.english: Don't be so restless.
